blogPost.title: How can I prevent getting the flu or other respiratory illnesses like a cold or COVID-19? Answer by @KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/G2XGqABNrn https://t.co/MS3wrLdDUP
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 如何预防感染流感或其他呼吸道疾病，如感冒或COVID-19？由@KeckMedUSC回答。https://t.co/G2XGqABNrn https://t.co/MS3wrLdDUP。
如何預防感染流感或其他呼吸道疾病，如感冒或COVID-19？由@KeckMedUSC回答。https://t.co/G2XGqABNrn https://t.co/MS3wrLdDUP。
インフルエンザをはじめ、風邪やCOVID-19などの呼吸器系の病気にかからないようにするにはどうしたらいいですか？回答者: @KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/G2XGqABNrn https://t.co/MS3wrLdDUP

previous.title: How can being outside affect your health? Answer by @alyraz, Founder @Hipcamp. https://t.co/jgE6AgXM7S https://t.co/BFedHwejOQ

localize.full_text: 外出如何影响健康？回答者：@alyraz，创始人@Hipcamp。https://t.co/jgE6AgXM7S https://t.co/BFedHwejOQ。
外出如何影響健康？回答者：@alyraz，創始人@Hipcamp。https://t.co/jgE6AgXM7S https://t.co/BFedHwejOQ。
外出が健康に与える影響は？回答者： @alyraz, Founder @Hipcamp. https://t.co/jgE6AgXM7S https://t.co/BFedHwejOQ

next.title: How can I deal with loneliness through the holidays? Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director @helloalphamd. https://t.co/9hQRkxNdt9 https://t.co/gY5Zror0Qz

localize.full_text: 如何应对孤独过节？回答者：Mary Jacobson，首席医疗主任@helloalphamd。https://t.co/9hQRkxNdt9 https://t.co/gY5Zror0Qz。
如何應對孤獨過節？回答者：Mary Jacobson，首席醫療主任@helloalphamd。https://t.co/9hQRkxNdt9 https://t.co/gY5Zror0Qz。
年末年始の寂しさにどう対処すればいいですか？Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director @helloalphamd. https://t.co/9hQRkxNdt9 https://t.co/gY5Zror0Qz
